name: Country Justice: Revenge of the Rednecks
name_original: Country Justice: Revenge of the Rednecks
description:
Country Justice: Revenge of the Rednecks is an action, shooter, racing and arcade game developed by 3 Romans. It came out on 03-01-2005. ValuSoft published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Country Justice: Revenge of the Rednecks on PC.
